testsuite.name: CinemaTests

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #2
The first line of the seating arrangement should be ' 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8'
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Enter the number of rows > 7 Enter the number of seats in each row > 8
1. Show the seats 2. Buy a ticket 0. Exit
> 1 Cinema: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 1 S S S S S S S S 2 S S S S S S S S 3 S S S S S S S S 4 S S S S S S S S 5 S S S S S S S S 6 S S S S S S S S 7 S S S S S S S S
